song.title: When peace like a river
song.subtitle: It is well with my soul
song.text:
# When peace like a river attendeth my way, when sorrows like sea billows roll, whatever my lot, thou has taught me to say, It is well, it is well with my soul".
* It is well (it is well) with my soul (with my soul). It is well it is well with my soul.
# Though Satan should buffet, tho' trials should come, let this blest assurance control, that Christ hath regarded my helpless estate, and hath shed his own blood for my soul.
# My sin - oh, the bliss of this glorious tho't! My sin - not in part, but the whole is nailed to his cross and I bear it no more. Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, o my soul!
# And, Lord, haste the day when the faith shall be sight, the clouds be rolled back as a scroll, the trumpet shall sound and the Lord shall descend. Even so" - it is well with my soul.
